name: カスタムメイト2
summary: The second game in the Custom Mate series once again allows the hero to create the girl of his dreams; this time not magically, but by engaging the services of Custom Corporation, whose operator is nevertheless still the same cute elf who created the girls in the previous game.
info:
• 别名: Custom Mate2
  • 平台: PC98
  • 平台: FM TOWNS
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1994-10-21
  • ブランド: Cocktail Soft
  • シナリオ: 素浪人
  • 原画: Ｍ２４
  • デザイン: はやし なおかず
  • 企画: はやし なおかず
  • 音楽: MUSE
